rev.desc.rev.desc: Some items are created with duplicated line items
QCCR1E112917 Data in ocml records are different if quote is created by ordering from catalog than manually
Changed expression 2 in $L.bundles in bundles in $L.work=2 in 1 in data in $L.work in panel set.bundles to 2 in $L.bundles in bundles in $L.work=part.desc in $L.part
Added processing to allow for line item deferral; modified line 12 of add.to.parts.list panel:

20 in $L.element in data in $L.work=defer.selection in $L.part;defer.selection in $L.part=nullsub(defer.selection in $L.part, false);if (defer.selection in $L.part=true) then (11 in $L.element in data in $L.work=true)
Also, x2 lines changed on the get.final.cost panel, line 3 changed to:

for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(component.part.no in $L.part)) do (if (defer.selection in $L.part=false and $L.i in component.option.type in $L.part={"required", "default"}) then ($L.part.list=$L.part.list+{$L.i in component.part.no in $L.part}))

If there are 3 dependent groups A > B > C (where A is dependent on B, B is dependent on C), and B is optional; if no item in B is ordered then items in group A will inherit dependency on group C ( A > C ).
Fixed problem where a part number in a phantom that is duplicated inside another nested phantom is the same caused the groups to be confused inside the nested phantom.
fixed issue where component quantity was not being calculated correctly.
Fixed a sorting issue that caused dependencies to be incorrect.
Now returns the duty table name from the modelvendor to the line item.
Fixed issues with quantity and create unique. Also fixed sequencing issues.
Removed a bug that surfaced when the first line item processed was a phantom.
Added the capability to resolve grouping and sequencing in event services.

descript.descript: Some items are created with duplicated line items
QCCR1E112917 Data in ocml records are different if quote is created by ordering from catalog than manually
Changed expression 2 in $L.bundles in bundles in $L.work=2 in 1 in data in $L.work in panel set.bundles to 2 in $L.bundles in bundles in $L.work=part.desc in $L.part
Added processing to allow for line item deferral; modified line 12 of add.to.parts.list panel:

20 in $L.element in data in $L.work=defer.selection in $L.part;defer.selection in $L.part=nullsub(defer.selection in $L.part, false);if (defer.selection in $L.part=true) then (11 in $L.element in data in $L.work=true)
Also, x2 lines changed on the get.final.cost panel, line 3 changed to:

for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(component.part.no in $L.part)) do (if (defer.selection in $L.part=false and $L.i in component.option.type in $L.part={"required", "default"}) then ($L.part.list=$L.part.list+{$L.i in component.part.no in $L.part}))

If there are 3 dependent groups A > B > C (where A is dependent on B, B is dependent on C), and B is optional; if no item in B is ordered then items in group A will inherit dependency on group C ( A > C ).
Fixed problem where a part number in a phantom that is duplicated inside another nested phantom is the same caused the groups to be confused inside the nested phantom.
fixed issue where component quantity was not being calculated correctly.
Fixed a sorting issue that caused dependencies to be incorrect.
Now returns the duty table name from the modelvendor to the line item.
Fixed issues with quantity and create unique. Also fixed sequencing issues.
Removed a bug that surfaced when the first line item processed was a phantom.
Added the capability to resolve grouping and sequencing in event services.
